game.name: Dress the Duel
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: "Dress the Duel"은 카드가 곧 옷장이고, 의상이 곧 무기인 로그라이크 덱빌딩 게임입니다!다양한 옷장을 구축하고, 전략적으로 탈의하며, 의상을 레이어링하여 강력한 효과를 얻어 결투를 펼쳐보세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: "Dress the Duel," is a roguelike deckbuilding game where your cards are your wardrobe and your outfit is your arsenal!Build a versatile wardrobe, disrobe strategically, layer outfits for powerful effects, and Dress the Duel!
